sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkPieceScalars is meant to display which piece is being requested as scalar values. It is usefull for visualizing the partitioning for streaming or distributed pipelines.
To create an instance of class vtkPieceScalars, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkPieceScalars

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkPieceScalars has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website. In the methods listed below, obj is an instance of the vtkPieceScalars class.
